headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MAS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since February 2025, Masco has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 0.7% while floating around $75.58. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 8.6% gain during that period.
